column4: i need help i have a problem with watching a dvd.. im on ubuntu 8.04 HH and i have libdvdcss3 i have vlc installed and xine
it still wont play
can anyone hlep me with a dvd problem
can someone help me with dvd problems
im looking for assistance with dvd issues, i cant play the dvd
how about ripping it
i tried it says, cant read from source
what dvd
nt2
any ideas?
does it play on a regular dvd player?
yes
i installed libdvdcss , i have xine and vlc installed and nothing will play it
u still here
seems that movie has some new copy protection on it; thus the trouble of playing on your computer -->national treasure 2 copy protection brings up a number of links with this issue
cool good to know
was there any finds on how to play it
the consensus so far is dvdshrink does it (though that would have to be via wine)
k9copy always did it for me; though in this case who knows
what did you google for nt2 issues on dvd playback
national treasure 2 copy protection
what where you saying i should use via wine
dvdshrink might work; who knows
